title: Bg. 11.29
sanskrit: यथा प्रदीप्‍तं ज्‍वलनं पतङ्गाविशन्ति नाशाय समृद्धवेगा: ।तथैव नाशाय विशन्ति लोका-स्तवापि वक्‍त्राणि समृद्धवेगा: ॥ २९ ॥
transliteration: yathā pradīptaṁ jvalanaṁ pataṅgāviśanti nāśāya samṛddha-vegāḥtathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokāstavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddha-vegāḥ
literary_trans: I see all people rushing full speed into Your mouths, as moths dash to destruction in a blazing fire.I see all people rushing full speed into Your mouths, as moths dash to destruction in a blazing fire.
